comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The former Virginia Conway Wheeler. See The Day book. (Chicago, Ill.), 31 July 1915, image 20. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045487/1915-07-31/ed-... which mentions that she, the daughter of Mrs. John Emory Wheeler will be married in late Fall to Captain Joseph H. Earl. It looks like the same photo.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=8370161 gives the last name a final "e", as in Earle. It names her husband as Joseph Haynsworth Earle, who was the son of a former U.S. Senator from South Carolina of the same name.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks all; we will update the record.
